teaser: Cybersecurity and Edward Snowden received most of the attention at high-level U.S.-China talks this week. Also high on the agenda? Foreign direct investment.
contentencoded:
Cybersecurity and Edward Snowden received most of the attention at high-level U.S.-China talks this week. Also high on the agenda? Foreign direct investment. The two countries discussed an agreement that would make it easier for American firms to do business in China and vice versa.

Marketplace's China Bureau Chief Rob Schmitz joins Mark Garrison to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, July 12, 2013
title: China and America play nice, discuss foreign direct investment deal
